entity.name: class_of_possession_of_property_by_activity
entity.description: A class_of_possession_of_property_by_activity is a type of action_property that is a Class_of_possession_of_property (as defined in the ARM).

explicit.name: definition
explicit.description: a Class_of_activity that has a mapping to the physical quantity space.

entity.name: class_of_possession_of_property_by_product
entity.description: A class_of_possession_of_property_by_product is a type of property_definition that is a Class_of_possession_of_property (as defined in the ARM).

entity.name: possessed_physical_quantity_space
entity.description: A possessed_physical_quantity_space is a type of general_property_association that specifies a Physical_quantity_space (as defined in the ARM) for a Class_of_possession_of_property (as defined in the ARM).

explicit.name: base_definition
explicit.description: a Physical_quantity_space that has possessed members.

where.label: link_to_possession
where.description: the Physical_quantity_space shall be referenced by a class of possession of property.

entity.name: physical_quantity_range
entity.description: A physical_quantity_range is a type of physical_quantity_space that is a Physical_quantity_range (as defined in the ARM).

entity.name: physical_quantity_space
entity.description: A physical_quantity_space is a type of general_property and class that is a Physical_quantity_space (as defined in the ARM).

entity.name: standard_tensor_order_and_symmetry
entity.description: A standard_tensor_order_and _symmetry is a type of tensor_order_and_symmetry_by_library_reference that is a Standard_tensor_order_and_symmetry (as defined in the ARM).

where.label: valid_standard_class
where.description: The supplier shall be 'ISO-TS-10303-1080', and the code shall be one of those listed in Table 1.

entity.name: tensor_order_and_symmetry
entity.description: A tensor_order_and_symmetry is a type of general_property and class that is a tensor_order_and_symmetry (as defined in the ARM).

entity.name: tensor_order_and_symmetry_by_library_reference
entity.description: A tensor_order_and_symmetry_by_library_reference is a type of tensor_order_and_symmetry and externally_defined_item that is a Tensor_order_and_symmetry_by_library_reference (as defined in the ARM).

entity.name: tensor_order_and_symmetry_for_physical_quantity_space
entity.description: A tensor_order_and_symmetry_for_physical_quantity_space is a type of general_property_relationship that is a Tensor_order_and_symmetry_for_physical_quantity_space (as defined in the ARM).

explicit.name: relating_property
explicit.description: the tensor_order_and_symmetry that indicates the tensor order and symmetry.

explicit.name: related_property
explicit.description: the physical_quantity_space that has the tensor order and symmetry.
